subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Box12 audio malfunction--fixed? Sweep side. w/FM linear voice
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_33b8_e1c_24ff
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I don't think there's even a contest between linear, and random scans. Voice 
quality, and consistency on linear is so much better than anything I ever 
got with the RVG. Leaving out the RVG will almost cut board size in half. 
The actual voice starts 4 seconds in.  Of course, it may not be so good for 
user(s) that want to interpret what comes through, for, lets say an 
audience?

Frank-S
